summary: Award-winning musician Björk and legendary broadcaster and naturalist Sir David Attenborough have admired each other's work for years but this is the first time they have discussed their ... See full summary »
cast: David Attenborough|Björk|Andy Cavatorta|Henry Dagg|Evan Grant|Matt Robertson|Oliver Sacks|Scott Snibbe|Tilda Swinton|Damian Taylor
title: Björk y Attenborough: La naturaleza de la música
